attributes.action: Begin a process of removal of illegal immigrants in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Sky news


https://news.sky.com/story/illegal-migrants-in-uk-hope-for-post-brexit-amnesty-11088290

It is estimated that more than a million migrants are living in the UK illegally, according to a former head of Home Office immigration enforcement.
attributes.background:
Begin a process of removal of illegal immigrants in the UK.
All UK citizens are required to abide by UK law. We demand that law is applied to all. It has been reported that there could be 1 million illegal immigrants in the UK.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because people who are in the UK illegally are already subject to deportation.

We are therefore unsure what action you like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
